product_name: Marker Griffon Schizo Downhill Ski Bindings
long_description: Designed for young and lightweight advanced skiers, the Marker Griffon Schizo downhill ski bindings cater to the type of skiing you choose: move them forward for the park or backward for all-mountain.
short_description: Designed for young and lightweight advanced skiers, the Marker Griffon Schizo downhill ski bindings cater to the type of skiing you choose: move them forward for the park or backward for all-mountain.
